meanings: [명사] adventure, escapade, [동사] run[take] the risk (of), have an adventure

vlive.korean: "번지 같은 극단적인 모험을 좋아하세요?" "Do you like extreme sport like bungee jumping"? 듣기 View video IZ*ONE : 까꿍🙈💕
vlive.english: "Do you like extreme sport like bungee jumping"?

vlive.korean: [그렇게 시작된 트와이스의 대모험!] 찾았다 찾았다! [That's the beginning of TWICE's adventure] I found it! 듣기 View video TWICE : TWICE REALITY “TIME TO TWICE” – 대탈출 EP.02
vlive.english: [That's the beginning of TWICE's adventure] I found it!

vlive.korean: 모험과 신비의 나라에서 펼쳐질 오늘의 투두! 뭘 할 거 같나요? What do you think we'll do today at this theme park? 듣기 View video TOMORROW X TOGETHER : TO DO X TOMORROW X TOGETHER 2020 - EP.9
vlive.english: What do you think we'll do today at this theme park?

vlive.korean: [기대감 500%! 모험심 가득한 소년들의 첫 무대는?] [What would it be like, the first stage performance by adventurous boys?] View video M2 : [FULL] TOMORROW X TOGETHER Welcome Back Show
vlive.english: [What would it be like, the first stage performance by adventurous boys?]

vlive.korean: 이거 모험이야. This is an adventure. 듣기 View video 포토피플(PHOTO PEOPLE) : 포토피플 in TOKYO 9부_ep.3 라이벌戰 정면승부가 시작된다!

examples.korean: Few can resist the lure of adventure. 발음듣기 모험의 유혹을 뿌리칠 수 있는 사람은 거의 없다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Few can resist the lure of adventure. 발음

examples.korean: a swashbuckling tale of adventure on the high seas 발음듣기 먼 바다에서 펼쳐지는, 액션 넘치는 모험담 Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: a swashbuckling tale of adventure on the high seas 발음

examples.korean: She entertained them by narrating her adventures in Africa. 발음듣기 그녀는 자신의 아프리카 모험담을 들려주어 그들을 즐겁게 했다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: She entertained them by narrating her adventures in Africa. 발음

examples.korean: her adventures travelling in Africa 발음듣기 아프리카를 여행한 그녀의 모험 Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: her adventures travelling in Africa 발음

examples.korean: He set off in quest of adventure. 발음듣기 그는 모험 탐구에 나섰다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: He set off in quest of adventure. 발음
